#historical #leopard2a5 #leopard2a6 #thermalsights #modern #realistic

Realistic sight for Leopard 2A5 and Leopard 2A6. Recreated as good as its possible to do in WT

Custom sight for Type10 added Chibi Commander Ami from Girls und Panzer

#type10 #type_10 #hitomaru #ami_chono #girls_und_panzer #japan

#historical #leopard2a4 #thermalsights #realistic #modern

Realistic thermal sight for Leopard 2A4. Adjusted to WT viewfinder and distance indicator for optimal use

#historical #t80bvm #t72b3 #thermalvision #realistic #modern

Realistic Sosna sight for T-80BVM and T-72B3. Thermal channel is TV limited so here we go with an LCD display imitation

当前版本：2.13.0.11 这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】
由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】
此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

新增：
德国: df_105

日本 ：10式

英国: 挑战者2_tes
法国： 勒克莱尔_sxxi
以色列：梅卡瓦MK_2d m_51_w


Current version: 2.13 0.11 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zuifan. Because it has not been updated for a long time, I just help update and optimize it. [the production of this sight is approved by the original author]

As the sight scale of some top vehicle...

#historical #t90 #t90a #thermalsights #modern #realistic

TV thermal sight of T-90A. It resembles the real one as good as i managed to recreate it in WT

#historical #abrams #m1a1fep #realistic #thermalsights #modern

Realistic sight for M1A1FEP. Recreated as great as possible to still match WT viewfinder and distance indicator

#anime #touhou #touhou_project #marisa #marisa_kirisame #sight #universal

Marisa Kirisame from the Touhou Project (is here to steal everything, especially your books) (preview is in 4x magnification)

art credit: https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/93662678 (this guy has great art, do check him out)

Line limit blocked me from fully completing the art sadly, but hey, at least you guys get Marisa.
As per usual, installation and editing instructions are on the first post in my account. (M4 SOPMOD 2 sight)
Oh right, this'll be my last sight for now (maybe). Have a great day!

Katyusha, Nonna, Klara Girls und Panzer universal sight

Requested by @TheKatyusHATman

Scene is from Girls und Panzer das Finale ep.1
Our smol commander comrade will lead us to victory!

pixiv https://www.pixiv.net/users/46778233

About the size
What is the difference between L and M S//L跟M S是什麼意思差別在哪裡

Just difference size,L=large M=medium S=small,and the draw is a little different//L跟M差在大小 L=大的 M=中等 S=小的,插圖有些微不一樣
large=suitable for World War 2 tank M=suitable for coldwar tank and main battle tank S=suitable for some tank only have high zoom sight for exp Radkampfwagen90 and SK-105 A2//大的適合給二戰車，中的適合給近代戰車，小的適合給只有高倍鏡的車 例如 輪式戰車90 或 SK-105 A2

i still can make other size if someone request(just leave c...

#anime #rachel #moe
English-
It's Rachel, my favorite character from Master of Eternity.

한국어-
마스터 오브 이터니티에 나온 제가 제일 좋아하는 케릭터인 라헬입니다.

Personal sights I made originally based on the Sosna-U

Basic universal version (the first 2 images) for any tank, as far as I was able to test it. Slightly more detailed versions for the T-90A, T-80U and T-80bvm

Left range markers are in km. Why? to be quite honest, I don't know. Reading the wiki documentation was really confusing so I really don't know what part of the code affects that. Coincidence rangefinder values are 800, 1200 and 1600 meters

Why do the MBTs need their own sights? Differences in FOV caused the rangefinder and rangefinder box to be misaligned. The outer li...
